issue.title: [Go] Add Support for Interval Type Month, Day, Nano
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13804](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13804). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10177> has been merged we should ensure Go supports the new type and enable integration tests for it.

comments.body:
